#
# File generated by CMakeBuilder
#
#
# YARP needs CMake 2.6 or greater
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)


SET(PROJECTNAME stageTwo)

PROJECT(${PROJECTNAME})

SET(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE release) 

# find YARP and boost
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(ICUB)


SET(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${YARP_MODULE_PATH})
SET(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${ICUB_MODULE_PATH})
INCLUDE(iCubOptions)
INCLUDE(iCubHelpers)

# add include directories
include_directories(${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(${ICUB_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(${IPOPT_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(/home/little-john/Documents/iCub/Programs)
include_directories(/home/little-john/iCubSoftware/IPOPT)


find_package(IPOPT)

# set up our program
add_executable(stageTwo initStageTwo.cpp)

# link with YARP libraries
target_link_libraries(stageTwo ${YARP_LIBRARIES} icubmod)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECTNAME} iKin ${YARP_LIBRARIES})
